short_description:
Win7 Log0n Changer Is Most Secure And Efficient Program Designed To Change Your Windows 7 Logon Background Without Much Works. 
The Simple User Interface Will Make It Quicker And Less Boring To Change Your Login Screen Background In A Swift. 
With The Help Of Some Tools Win7 Log0n Changer Not Only Changes Logon Background, But Also It Could Change The Logon Screens 
Default Windows 7 Logo Into Any Logo You May Have Desire And So Could Capture The Logon Screen As An Image.

FOR Win7 Log0n Changer To Run MUST Have The Following:
- Windows 7 Installed PC
- Microsoft .NET Framework Version 4 Or Above.
[If You Don't Have .NET Framework Installed Get It From - http://is.gd/dotNetFx40_Full_x86_x64 ]

To Take Part In Developing Contact Me.
For Help - http://bit.ly/Vc3ueQ

IF YOU FINDS ANY BUG OR ANY ADDITIONAL FEATURE THAT COULD BE ADDED TO WIN7 LOG0N CHANGER.
CONTACT ME THROUGH THE INBUILD SUPPORT FUNCTION IN WIN7 LOG0N CHANGER.

Regards
AryChh
